manifest.author: Alex Yatskov
manifest.content_security_policy: default-src 'self'; img-src blob: 'self'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; media-src *; connect-src *
manifest.name: Yomichan

userAgent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/112.0.0.0 Safari/537.36
